dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, StockAnalysis, KotakSecurities, InvestyWise)

Q1_FY2026.notes: Strong quarter driven by AC season demand

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue fell 2.34% YoY. Net loss of Rs 32.86 cr (profit fell 271.15%). Seasonal weakness post AC season.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Revenue from operations Rs 1,88,307.99 lakhs (vs Rs 1,41,306.95 lakhs YoY, +33.3% growth). However, PAT resulted in loss of Rs 4,873.28 lakhs (vs profit of Rs 2,272.73 lakhs in Q3 FY25).

nineMonthFY2026.notes: Nine months Apr-Dec 2025. Total Income Rs 5,17,248.77 lakhs. PAT Rs 5,572.27 lakhs.

FY2025.notes: Revenue growth of 37.94% YoY. Q4 FY25 showed 48% revenue growth.

keyRatios.notes: High PE of 190x. Significant leverage compared to peers. Revenue growth strong but profitability constrained.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Higher leverage than most peers (D/E 0.87). Net debt of Rs 10.15 bn. Significant capex investment for capacity expansion.

keyHighlights: Record revenue in Q4 FY25 with 48% growth
Q1 FY26 strong driven by AC season
Seasonal losses in Q2 and Q3 FY26
Major OEM/ODM supplier for AC industry
Q3 FY26 board approved unaudited results
